greeting:
👋 Hello! I’m Dayframe — your personal assistant.

Here’s what I can help you with:
• 📅 Plan your tasks and days
• 📥 Save notes, files, and ideas
• 🔍 Search by keywords or meaning
• 🕸️ Visualize connections between your notes

💬 Everything you write (except commands) is saved automatically. Later, you’ll be able to find it using similar words or topics.

🧠 Your knowledge base is built from our conversation.

🕸️ Want to see what’s already stored? Use the /graph command.
